verses.verse: I lifted up <WH5375> mine eyes <WH5869> again, and looked, <WH7200> and behold <WH2009> a man <WH376> with a measuring <WH4060> line <WH2256> in his hand. <WH3027>

Then said <WH559> I, Whither <WH575> goest <WH1980> thou? <WH859> And he said <WH559> unto <WH413> me, To measure <WH4058> <WH853> Jerusalem, <WH3389> to see <WH7200> what <WH4100> is the breadth <WH7341> thereof, and what <WH4100> is the length <WH753> thereof.
And, behold, <WH2009> the angel <WH4397> that talked <WH1696> with me went forth, <WH3318> and another <WH312> angel <WH4397> went out <WH3318> to meet <WH7125> him,

And said <WH559> unto <WH413> him, Run, <WH7323> speak <WH1696> to <WH413> this <WH1975> young man, <WH5288> saying, <WH559> Jerusalem <WH3389> shall be inhabited <WH3427> as towns without walls <WH6519> for the multitude <WH4480> <WH7230> of men <WH120> and cattle <WH929> therein: <WH8432>
For I, <WH589> saith <WH5002> the LORD, <WH3068> will be <WH1961> unto her a wall <WH2346> of fire <WH784> round about, <WH5439> and will be <WH1961> the glory <WH3519> in the midst <WH8432> of her.

Ho, <WH1945> ho, <WH1945> come forth, and flee <WH5127> from the land <WH4480> <WH776> of the north, <WH6828> saith <WH5002> the LORD: <WH3068> for <WH3588> I have spread you abroad <WH6566> <WH853> as the four <WH702> winds <WH7307> of the heaven, <WH8064> saith <WH5002> the LORD. <WH3068>
Deliver thyself, <WH4422> O <WH1945> Zion, <WH6726> that dwellest <WH3427> with the daughter <WH1323> of Babylon. <WH894>

For <WH3588> thus <WH3541> saith <WH559> the LORD <WH3068> of hosts; <WH6635> After <WH310> the glory <WH3519> hath he sent <WH7971> me unto <WH413> the nations <WH1471> which spoiled <WH7997> you: for <WH3588> he that toucheth <WH5060> you toucheth <WH5060> the apple <WH892> of his eye. <WH5869>

For, <WH3588> behold, <WH2009> I will shake <WH5130> <WH853> mine hand <WH3027> upon <WH5921> them, and they shall be <WH1961> a spoil <WH7998> to their servants: <WH5650> and ye shall know <WH3045> that <WH3588> the LORD <WH3068> of hosts <WH6635> hath sent <WH7971> me.

Sing <WH7442> and rejoice, <WH8055> O daughter <WH1323> of Zion: <WH6726> for, <WH3588> lo, <WH2009> I come, <WH935> and I will dwell <WH7931> in the midst <WH8432> of thee, saith <WH5002> the LORD. <WH3068>

And many <WH7227> nations <WH1471> shall be joined <WH3867> to <WH413> the LORD <WH3068> in that <WH1931> day, <WH3117> and shall be <WH1961> my people: <WH5971> and I will dwell <WH7931> in the midst <WH8432> of thee, and thou shalt know <WH3045> that <WH3588> the LORD <WH3068> of hosts <WH6635> hath sent <WH7971> me unto <WH413> thee.
And the LORD <WH3068> shall inherit <WH5157> <WH853> Judah <WH3063> his portion <WH2506> in <WH5921> the holy <WH6944> land, <WH127> and shall choose <WH977> Jerusalem <WH3389> again. <WH5750>
Be silent, <WH2013> O all <WH3605> flesh, <WH1320> before <WH4480> <WH6440> the LORD: <WH3068> for <WH3588> he is raised up <WH5782> out of his holy <WH6944> habitation. <WH4480> <WH4583>
